hi there! I am thinking about it too. Sometimes i think that the fact you have full control of content you are seeding may help. But sometimes i think the ZeroNet will go down to "dark" anyway. :( I am not sure.
btw we have own small decentralized net but it is working over http, so (i hope) it will help to stay "white" :)
it's like Fido, if you know about fido... But ZeroNet technically is just amazing!

p.s. sorry for poor english
